Title: Class Grades Manager
Description: A simple class records management app for teachers/professors inspired by Metro UI.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple class records management app for teachers/professors inspired by Metro UI.

I will be moving this project to GitHub: https://github.com/anjelo/class-grades-manager

Originally a small project back in my school days. I've decided to release the source to public so that lots of improvements could me made.

Actually, a professor of mine asked me to make a software (which became this one) for him so that he can handle the grades of a bit huge amount of classes he handle every semester.

This project has still got some (or a lot) bugs so you may contribute by posting an issue.
